comment: Honestly amazing teacher, just make sure to study for final but she is literally the G.O.A.T.
Everything about this teacher is great. Take her she can only do Saturdays but she is the G.O.A.T.

Honestly I am terrible at chemistry but she really spells stuff out for you in the lab. She speaks quickly but she's so efficient. She gets you IN AND OUT ASAP. Not a tough grader, but the workload does feel heavy. She's such a cool professor. Would recommend.
Took her and loved her! She is the best. She'll help you with anything and gives clear directions. I barley understand chem but she somehow got me to understand it. Take her!!

Take her!!! She's amazing, super chill, and ensures everyone understands what they're doing. Make sure to do your notebook, but she'll let small mistakes slide. Hilarious and drops the lowest lab grade at the end of the semester

Take Professor Loomba!!!! Shes an awesome professor and I am so glad I took her class this semester. She always helps us with our labs and answers any questions we have. She also relates to us so so well and is so so funny. I recommend taking her!
Ms. Loomba was amazing! The labs were very easy, she helps you through each one! She's very caring and understanding, and she was absolutely hilarious! Take her!
She's an amazing and kinda funny teacher. She's super helpful as well. TAKE HERRRRR
Dr. Loomba is a great professor! She always went around to check in on everyone and answer people's questions. She explained things clearly and was not a strict grader. I definitely recommend her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Took this class online. We used labflow and all due dates were posted so it was easy to keep track of it. She was awesome! Very understanding and the work was easy! Attendance was mandatory because we did lab through a call and had to show our faces. Super easy! Highly recommend!!

this semester we had to go online because of covid and this professor made chem lab so much easier than you would think taking a lab online would be. she walked us through all the labs and even though i was confused on some of the content (since my separate chem teacher was bad) with her help i made As on all the labs! she rounded up my grade to A
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: TAKE Prof. Loomba. In her lectures she breaks down all the math and science behind each lab and each content assessment, making it very easy to pass with a high grade. She's very chill, expects you to pay attention but answers every question with patience. She even reopened pre-quizzes to help struggling students who didn't understand. Easy final!
You only have lab every other week and content assessments when you don't, which are easy.

Such a respectful professor! She always took the time to make sure everyone understood and explained things clearly, regardless of how many times she had to repeat herself. She treated us equally & worked with us to make the online lab less of a burden. The content could get a bit hard but that was the school's fault, not hers. She helped so much!
Best Chem lab professor ! You only have an actual lab every other week and a content assessment when you dont have lab. Watch out for sig figs, show up to class, and quizlet is your friend.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Shes a wonderful teacher and is super helpful. With her online class, she waits on her students and makes sure no student is left behind. Definitely take her for chem lab, you wont regret it!

Prof. Loomba did her best with having to teach an online LAB class. It's hard! She was good at explaining patiently if you didn't understand. Unlimited tries on content assessments. Labs were mostly data entry based on calculations and experiments done over webcam/online lecture. Read the lab manual (online) and take notes. Submit before deadlines!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: I absolutely love Professor Loomba, there are content assessments and labs, and it is pretty simple. She guides you through it all and answers any questions. TAKE HER!! You will need to go over and study the lab manual for each prelab quiz but its similar to what you will be learning in chemistry 1151 anyways.
Caring, respectful

The quizzes are open notebook so whatever you write down on there you can use. She gives you the information that you need to have for the exams and tests you take. Introductory level chem lab thats easy to get a good grade on and to learn the content for. Shes very easy to talk to, so whatever you dont know or understand you can ask her.

Quiz every class, allows you to use lab notebook, not a strict grader on lab reports or lab notebook, tries her best to prepare you for a final she has never seen, nor will ever see (written by a higher up professor)
